text: R360 at R327 junction R360 - dangerous bends The R360 road is a regional road in County Galway, Ireland. Southeast to northwest the route connects the town of Dunmore to Ballymoe. The road is in Northwest County Galway and is long. ==See also== *Roads in Ireland *National primary road *National secondary road ==References== *Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2006 – Department of Transport Category:Regional roads in the Republic of Ireland Category:Roads in County Galway
title: R360 road (Ireland)
